Vendor Information

REGISTER HERE!

Hello there vendors! We are pleased that you are interested in becoming a vendor for the 2016 Women Working With Women Conference. The information provided below will give you an idea of what to expect during the conference and hopefully answer most of your questions.


When and Where?

When: July 15-17, 2016

Where: The Hilton University Of Florida Conference Center

1714 SW 34th Street, Gainesville FL, 32307


What Should I Expect?

The 2016 Women Working With Women Conference is designed to be a get-away weekend for women of all ages. This is your opportunity to promote your business/organization.

The conference will cater to three types of women: women, pastor’s wives, and teens (ages 13-17). We have inspiring, spirit-filled, workshops, general sessions, and praise and worship planned for them. During the conference we will have a vendor's exhibit, and prize give-a-ways.


Vendor Exhibit Display Times

Date(s)

Times(s)

July 15, 2016

11:00AM - 6:00PM

July 16, 2016

8:40PM - 11:00PM

July 17, 2016

8:00AM - 2:00PM


Vendor Booth Specifications and Accommodations

• One (1) 5' table

• Table covering (1) will be provided

• Two (2) chairs will be provided for each booth with a white or black table skirt

• All spaces will be assigned by event personnel

• Electrical or extension cords will not be provided. Please let us know if you need to be near an electrical outlet.

• One (1) copy of the prorgram for the conference

• One (1) vendor location map

• Volunteers will be available to assist with setup and breakdown


What Should I Bring?

• Business/organization banners/tablecloths

• Products to sell or give away

• Promotional material (free-bees)

• Informational handouts

• Business cards

• Extension cords (if you will need a power outlet)


Where Should I Stay?

It is important to note that lodging is not included in your registration cost. Please contact the Hilton University of Florida Conference Center Hotel to reserve a room for your stay during the conference. We highly recommend staying in this hotel because it is the host site for the conference. We have blocked off rooms specifically for attendees and vendors of the conference on a first come first serve basis. Please contact them at 352-371-3600 to make your room reservation. Hotel room fees include breakfast coupons for Friday and Saturday and free Wi-Fi.


How Do I Register?

We are so glad you asked. To register please click on the registration link below. This link will take you through our Eventbrite registration process. The cost for registration is $150 ($50 deposit included). You can pay the deposit first and pay the rest later or pay the full $150 amount at one time. All registration costs are subject to a service fee.

Registration is due by June 15, 2016

Because of the limited amount of vendor spots we have, if you would like to register as a vendor, you will have to contact Kayla Sutherland for the registration password that will allow you to access the Eventbrite registration site. Please send her an email at 4wskhs@gmail.com.

Please complete the form and have your payment ready. You will not be able to save your registration and pay later. You will only have 20 minutes to complete your registration so please have all of the necessary information ready. The information you need to know before hand for each vendor is:

  • • First and last name
  • • Contact email address
  • • Contact job title
  • • Home/cell phone
  • • Organization/business name and address
  • • Website (if applicable)
  • • Fax number (if applicable)
  • • A brief description of the product(s)/service(s) to display/sell during the conference
  • • A description of the item to donate as raffle prize

Click Below to Register:
REGISTER HERE!

After you register and submit your payment, an email will be sent to the email provided during registration with the vendor registration agreement for the vendor representative to sign and send back to Kayla Sutherland at 4wskhs@gmail.com.

If you would like to be a sponsor, give a donation, or have any questions, please contact the vendor coordinator:

Belinda Smith: 4wsbms@gmail.com


Refund Policy

Attendee/Vendor Refund Policy

Any payment made for an attendee or vendor is non-refundable so please be sure you are able to commit to attending the 2016 Women Working With Women Conference. Please contact Belinda Smith for any questions or concerns with this matter at 4wsbms@gmail.com.
